scripts.netlify:build-studio: npm run build && cd build && npm install && npm run build-studio && cp studio/netlify.toml studio/dist
scripts.netlify:build-web: npm run build && cd build && npm install && npm run build-web
scripts.copy-node-modules: npm run copy-studio-node-modules && npm run copy-web-node-modules
scripts.export: cd build/studio && sanity dataset export blog ../../data/production.tar.gz
scripts.lint-build: npm run build && (cd build && npm install && npm run lint)
scripts.test: npm run build && cd build && npm install && npm run build

hooks.pre-push: ([ -z "$SKIP_HOOK" ] && sanity-template lockfiles && git add '*package-lock.json*' && git diff --quiet && SKIP_HOOK=1 git commit -m 'chore: generate lockfiles') && echo 'Committed lockfiles' || echo ''
